name: A. Nastya Is Reading a Book
statement:
After lessons Nastya decided to read a book. The book contains n
chapters, going one after another, so that one page of the book belongs
to exactly one chapter and each chapter contains at least one
page.Yesterday evening Nastya did not manage to finish reading the book,
so she marked the page with number k as the first page which was not
read (i.e. she read all pages from the 1-st to the (k-1)-th).The next
day Nastya’s friend Igor came and asked her, how many chapters remain to
be read by Nastya? Nastya is too busy now, so she asks you to compute
the number of chapters she has not completely read yet (i.e. the number
of chapters she has not started to read or has finished reading
somewhere in the middle).
